organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: NBA BASKETBALL - STANDINGS AFTER THURSDAY 'S GAMES .

Let's think step by step.

1. NBA (National Basketball Association)

The NBA is the premier men's professional basketball league in North America and is composed of 30 teams (29 in the United States and 1 in Canada). It was founded in 1946 and is one of the four major professional sports leagues in the United States and Canada. The NBA is widely considered to be the premier men's professional basketball league in the world.

2. Teams (e.g. Lakers, Celtics, Raptors, etc.)

These are the individual organizations that make up the NBA. Each team is a separate entity with its own management, players, and fan base. The standings after Thursday's games would refer to the current ranking of these teams based on their performance in the ongoing season.

2. Teams (e.g. Lakers, Celtics, Raptors, etc.)
